Class DeckListModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractListModel<DeckModel>
      • edu.wpi.cs.wpisuitetng.modules.planningpoker.model.DeckListModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.ListModel<DeckModel>

    public class DeckListModel
extends javax.swing.AbstractListModel<DeckModel>
    A model for storing all the decks currently in the database.

    1.0
    Author:
    Team 9
